name: PuppetsVR
description: Social experience focused around bringing puppetry to the virtual world
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 970 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 980 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
